thread.title: Toyota suspends output at three Japan plants due to heavy rains
thread.title_full: Toyota suspends output at three Japan plants due to heavy rains | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Toyota suspends output at three Japan plants due to heavy rains
text:
TOKYO Toyota Motor Corp ( 7203.T ) said it had canceled the day shift at three factories in northeastern Japan due to heavy rains that earlier on Friday burst the banks of a river in the city of Osaki, in Miyagi prefecture.
There has been no damage at the facilities - two in Miyagi and one in neighboring Iwate prefecture - which are run by its subsidiary Toyota Motor East Japan, a spokeswoman said.
Toyota will decide whether it will resume operations for the evening shift by around noon, she added.
(Reporting by Minami Funakoshi; Editing by Chang-Ran Kim )
